attributes.action: Call for a public inquiry into the failure to protect girls from grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: It has to be a National overarching Inquiry to ensure that National recommendations are made. The fear of offending a certain demographic has to be discussed and everyone treated or prosecuted equally
attributes.background: The Government should establish a Public Inquiry into this without fear nor favour. It us important that the reasons these young girls were betrayed is exposed and that lessons are learned for the future

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
